plot: Daffy haplessly attempts to prove to the jocularly doubtful Friar Tuck Porky that he is actually Robin Hood.
title: Robin Hood Daffy
plot_es: Daffy haplessly attempts to prove to the jocularly doubtful Friar Tuck Porky that he is actually Robin Hood.
plot_en: Daffy haplessly attempts to prove to the jocularly doubtful Friar Tuck Porky that he is actually Robin Hood.

cast.role: Daffy Duck as Robin Hood /              Porky Pig as Friar Tuck
cast.name: Mel Blanc
